Articles.Content:
Hello all! I stumbled upon KSP a few days ago and long story short, I\'m hooked. I downloaded the free version of 13.3, read a few tutorials and such, and after a few successful mun-and-backs, I just had to get my hands on the full game. However, reading around the KSP site I\'m a little confused... Will there be a new 'download full game' link that pops up after I\'ve purchased the game, or will I be sent a physical copy of the game so far, after which I download updates? Any help for an aspiring rocketeer would be very much appreciated.

-Figs

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

After purchase confirmation, you\'ll be able to log into your store account and find a link to download the game in your profile.

After installing it, you will then be able to update from 0.14 to 0.14.1 using the game patcher.

There are no physical copies as the game is still in early development stages.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
